creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: Standing female in a floral dress, green top and rose colored sash; she holds a basket of flowers on her proper left arm and another on her head holding it in place with her other hand.
markings: Blue crossed swords, impressed \'8\' and \'131\', and \'79\' in brown paint under base.
object_name: Woman with basket of flowers figure
title: Woman with basket of flowers figure
